review: So I've finally put my Fire TV Stick into action.It's great if you only use Prime or Netflix however I must state that the rest of the channels aka "apps" are lacking compared to other mainstream devices.. (ROKU.. I'm talking about ROKU)..For example their spotify integration requires that I actually control the "fire stick" from my phone or other device on the network instead of just connecting to my spotify directly.  The Showtime app doesn't have comcast for a provider.. I mean really who doesn't have "xfinity" these days.There are no "news" apps that I could find to run in the background.. (Not that Roku does this very well but they do have some).So overall I have to give this a 3 start attempt by Amazon to break into the streaming device market.  Nice start but needs updates and more options.  I am happy that I'll be able to use netflix and prime instant video on it though so I went into this with the attitude that I'd give it a try and at least use it for those 2 mainstream streaming services, I was just hoping for more.
